attributes.action: Gordon Brown to Sack Alistair Darling and then Resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basically they have both proven their incompetence with the economy, falling house prices, propping up banks with tax payers money, fuel prices out of control and on top of that from a socialist party a tax which makes the poor worse off!! 

Time for them to go I think.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
